author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CATASTROPHIC WINDS MOVING ONSHORE SOUTHERN JAMAICA... ...LAST CHANCE TO PROTECT YOUR LIFE... ...1000 AM EDT POSITION UPDATE...
summary: ...CATASTROPHIC WINDS MOVING ONSHORE SOUTHERN JAMAICA... ...LAST CHANCE TO PROTECT YOUR LIFE... ...1000 AM EDT POSITION UPDATE... As of 10:00 AM EDT Tue Oct 28 the center of Melissa was located near 17.7, -78.1 with movement NNE at 7 mph. The minimum central pressure was 892 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 185 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
